sys_update_xml.name: sp_instance_5fd18804db8323007ce85385ca96194d
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_instance"><sp_instance action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><class_name/><color>default</color><css/><glyph/><id/><order>1</order><roles/><short_description/><size>md</size><sp_column display_value="2">4bb14c04db8323007ce85385ca96194e</sp_column><sp_widget display_value="Notification Preferences">080ab773dbb223007ce85385ca96191b</sp_widget><sys_class_name>sp_instance</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>david.scroggins</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-11 21:52:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>5fd18804db8323007ce85385ca96194d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_instance_5fd18804db8323007ce85385ca96194d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>david.scroggins</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-11 21:52:40</sys_updated_on><title/><url/><widget_parameters/></sp_instance><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5fd18804db8323007ce85385ca96194d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_080ab773dbb223007ce85385ca96191b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>custom</category><client_script><![CDATA[function($timeout,$interval,$http,$rootScope, $location, $anchorScroll, spModal,i18n) {
	/* widget controller */
	
	var c = this,
			baseApiUrl = '/api/now/v1/notification/preference',
			baseUrl = c.data.instanceName;
	

	c.enableNotifications = true;
	c.showNotifications = false;
	c.showCategoryNotifications = false;
	c.showCategoryNotificationsPersonal = false;
	c.showCategoryNotificationDevices = false;
	c.showCategories = true;
	c.showDevices = false;
	c.notifDevices = {};
	c.subObjects = [];
	c.subNotifObjects = [];
	c.notifObjects = [];
	c.catNotifications = [];
	c.subscriptions = [];
	c.notifSubDevices = [];
	c.backText = '';
	c.lastSection = {};
	
	c.toggleNotifications = function(e){		
			$http.post(baseApiUrl + '/all', {enable_notifications: !c.enableNotifications})
			.then(function(response){
					getUserNotificationPreference();					
		  });		
	};
	
	c.toggleDevices = function(id,flag){		
		var channel_data = {};
		channel_data.sys_id = id;
		channel_data.active = flag;

		$http.post(baseApiUrl + '/channel', {channel: channel_data})
			.then(function(response){			
					//console.log(response);					
		  });		
	};
	
	c.goBack = function(where){
		
		if(where.name == 'all'){
			c.showNotifications = false;
			c.showCategories = true;
			c.showDevices = false;
			c.showCategoryNotifications = false;
			c.showCategoryNotificationsPersonal = false;
			c.showCategoryNotificationDevices = false;
		}else{
			c.backText = 'Notifications';
		    c.lastSection.name = 'all';
			c.showCategoryNotificationDevices = false;
			getNotifications(where.id,where.name);
		}
		
	};
	
	function getUserNotificationPreference(){
		$http.get(baseApiUrl + '/channel')
			.then(function(data){			
			if(data.data && data.data.result){
			c.enableNotifications = data.data.result.enable_notifications;
			c.notifDevices = data.data.result.channels;	
			}
		});
	}
	
	
	c.showTab = function(tab, e){
		if(tab == 'n'){
			c.showNotifications = false;
			c.showCategories = true;
			c.showDevices = false;
			c.showCategoryNotifications = false;
			c.showCategoryNotificationsPersonal = false;
			c.showCategoryNotificationDevices = false;
			$('.cm-noti-tab').addClass('active');
		    $('.cm-chan-tab').removeClass('active');
		}else{
			c.showNotifications = false;
			c.showCategories = false;
			c.showDevices = true;
			c.showCategoryNotifications = false;
			c.showCategoryNotificationsPersonal = false;
			c.showCategoryNotificationDevices = false;
			$('.cm-noti-tab').removeClass('active');
		    $('.cm-chan-tab').addClass('active');
		}
	};
		
	
	function getNotifications(id,name){
	c.showCategories = false;
	$http.get(baseApiUrl + '?category=' + id + '&sysparm_limit=100&sysparm_offset=0' )
	.then(function(data){
		if(data.data && data.data.result){
			var prefObj = data.data.result.preferences;
			var sysNotifications = [];
			var personalNotifications = [];
			
			for(var m = 0 ; m < prefObj.length ; m++){
				var deviceNames = '';
				var arr = prefObj[m].records;
				angular.forEach(arr,function(rec,index){
					if(rec.logical_active == true)
						if(index === arr.length - 1)
						deviceNames += rec.channel.name.toString();
					else
						deviceNames += rec.channel.name.toString() + ', ';
				});
				
				prefObj[m].deviceNames = deviceNames.replace(/,\s*$/, "");
				prefObj[m].categoryName = name;
				if(prefObj[m].type == 'system'){
					sysNotifications.push(prefObj[m]);
				}else{
					personalNotifications.push(prefObj[m]);
					c.showCategoryNotificationsPersonal = true;
				}
			}
			c.notifObjects = sysNotifications;
			c.subscriptions = personalNotifications;
			c.showCategoryNotifications = true;
		}
		});
  }
	
	c.openFormModal = function(table, sysId, title){
		 spModal.open({
            title: title,
            widget: 'widget-form',
			      buttons: [],
           widgetInput: { table: table, sys_id: sysId, view: 'concourse_notification_preferences'}
        }).then(function () {
            //console.log('widget dismissed');
        });
	};
	
	c.toggleNotificationDevice = function(active,channel_id,notification_id,sys_id,table){
		
		var data = {};
		data.active = active;
		data.channel_id = channel_id;
		data.notification_id = notification_id;
		data.sys_id = (sys_id != '')? sys_id : null;
		data.table = table;
		
		$http.post(baseApiUrl, {preference : data})
			.then(function(response){
				//console.log(data);			
		});
	};
	
	///init///////////////////////////////
	$http.get(baseApiUrl + '/category?sysparm_limit=100&sysparm_offset=0')
		.then(function(data){
		if(data.data && data.data.result){
			c.subObjects = data.data.result.categories;
			c.selectedSubObject = c.subObjects[0];
			getUserNotificationPreference();			
		}
	});	
   /////////////////////////////////////////////////

	c.catDetails = function(id, name, idx){
		c.backText = 'Notifications';
		c.lastSection.name = 'all';
		c.lastSection.id = id;
		getNotifications(id, name);	
	};
	
	c.notiDetails = function(obj, idx){
		c.backText = obj.categoryName;
		c.lastSection.name = obj.categoryName;
		c.lastSection.id = obj.category.sys_id;
		c.notificationName = obj.name;
		c.notifSubDevices = obj;
		c.showCategoryNotificationDevices = true;
		c.showCategoryNotificationsPersonal = false;
		
	};

	//////Responsiveness
	function resizeDivs(b , c){
		b = b || '';
		c = c || '';
		$('.cm-subs-noti-pref .cm-subs-list-item .content-icon').css('padding-right', b);
		$('.cm-subs-noti-pref .cm-subs-list-item .content-header').css('width', c);	
	}

	var interval;
	function windowResized() {
		var viewPortWidth = $(window).width();
		if (viewPortWidth < 380){
			if(interval){
				$interval.cancel(interval);
				interval = null;
			}	
			interval = $interval(function(){
				resizeDivs('5px','80%');
			}, 50);
		}
		else if (viewPortWidth < 660){
			if(interval){
				$interval.cancel(interval);
				interval = null;
			}	
			interval = $interval(function(){
				resizeDivs('10px','85%');
			}, 50);
		}
		else if (viewPortWidth < 1210){
			if(interval){
				$interval.cancel(interval);
				interval = null;
			}	
			interval = $interval(function(){
				resizeDivs('','90%');
			}, 50);
		}
		else{
			$interval.cancel(interval);
			interval = null;
			resizeDivs();
		}
	}

	var timeout;
	$(window).resize(function() {
		if(timeout){
			$timeout.cancel(timeout);
			timeout = null;
		}
		timeout = $timeout(windowResized, 50);
	});

	$(document).ready(function(){
		timeout = $timeout(windowResized, 50); 
	});

	//--/


}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>$cm-switch-bg : #71E279;
$cm-switch-box-shadow: inset 0 1px 3px 0 #828890;

.cm-subs-noti-pref {
  .panel {
    border:none;
    box-shadow: none;
  }
  .cm-notif-pref-header{
    display: inline-flex;
    .cm-recv-notif{
      display: inherit;
      padding-top: 50px;
      padding-left: 10px;
      p{
        font-weight: 300;
        font-size: 14px;  
        padding-top: 5px;        
      }
      .input-switch{
        padding-left: 10px;
      }
    }
  }
  .cm-widget-header {
    width: 75%;
    .main-header {
      font-weight: normal;
    }
    .sub-header {
      font-weight: 300;
      font-size: 18px;
    }
    .sub-header {
      font-size: $csm-primary-text-size + 4px;
    }
  }
  .cm-left-pane {
    margin-top: 65px;
    .cm-list-item {
      padding: 5px 0px;
    }
    .cm-list-item.active {
      color: $link-color;
      font-weight: 500;
      cursor: auto;
    }
    .cm-list-item:not(.active){
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .cm-list-item:not(.active):hover {
      text-decoration: underline;
    }
  }
  .cm-right-pane {
    .cm-widget-tabs {
      padding: 15px 0px 0px;
      .nav-tabs {
        border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
        margin-bottom: -1px;
      }
      .nav-tabs {
        border-color: $csm-border-color;
      }
      .nav-tabs > li {
        padding: 0px 30px;
        font-size : 18px;
        font-weight: 400;
        line-height: 29px;
      }
      .nav-tabs > li.widget-collapse {
        padding-right: 0px;
      }
      .nav-tabs  > li:not(:last-of-type){
        // margin-right: 55px;
      }
      .nav-tabs  > li  > a {
        border: none;
        padding: 10px 0px 10px;
      }
      .nav-tabs  > li.active {
        border-bottom: 2px solid $link-color;
        a {
          color: $brand-primary;
        }
      }
      .nav-tabs  > li.active > a {
        background-color: inherit;
      }

      .hover-effect:hover {
        background-color: initial;
        //border-bottom: 2px solid $text-color;
        cursor: pointer;
      }

    }
    .cm-widget-body {
      padding-top: 20px;
      padding-left: 0px;
      padding-right: 0px;
      padding-bottom: 0px;      
    }
    .cm-widget-body.cm-mobile {
      padding: 0px;
      .cm-settings-parent {
        .cm-settings-name {
          margin: 0px;
          padding: 10px 0px 15px;
          font-weight: normal;
          .cm-toggle-icon {
            color: #ccc;
            font-size: 22px;
          }
          .cm-toggle-icon {
            color: $csm-icon-color;
          }
        }
      }
      .cm-settings-parent:not(:last-of-type) .cm-settings-name{
        border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
      }
      .cm-settings-parent:not(:last-of-type) .cm-settings-name{
        border-bottom: 1px solid $csm-border-color;
      }
      .cm-settings-main {
        margin-bottom: 20px;
        .panel.csm-tile{
          border-top: none;
        }
        .cm-settings-panel .cm-settings-body {
          border : none;
          padding: 0px;
          margin: 0px;
        }
      }
    }
    .cm-subs {
      .panel-body {
        padding-bottom: 10px;
      }
      .cm-subs-list {
        .cm-subs-list-item {
          padding: 15px 0px 0px;
          .cm-sub-name {
            .content-icon {
              display: inline-block;
              float: left;
              font-size: 22px;
              vertical-align: top;
              color: $link-color;
              padding-right: 15px;
              .cm-green{
                color: #5cb85c;
              }
            }
            .content-header {
              display: inline-block;
              width: 90%;
              word-wrap: break-word;
              .cm-subhead {
                margin-top: 3px;
                margin-bottom: 5px;
                line-height: 16px;
                font-weight: 400;
                a, a:hover{
                  color: $text-muted;
                }
              }
              .info {
                a, a:hover{
                  color: $text-color;
                }
              }
            }
            
          .cm-subscribe-btn {
            .fa {
              font-size: 16px;
              margin-right: 3px;
            }
          }        	
          .cm-sub-desc {
            line-height: 23px;
            padding-left: 30px;
            a, a:hover {
              color: $text-color;
            }
          }
          .cm-subscribe-hover {
            .cm-hide-me {
              display: none;
            }
          }
          .cm-subscribe-hover:hover {
            .cm-show-me {
              display: none;
            }    
            .cm-hide-me {
              display: initial;
            }
          }
        }
        .cm-subs-list-item:not(:last-of-type){
          padding: 10px 0px;
          border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; 
        }
        .cm-subs-list-item:not(:last-of-type){
          border-bottom: 1px solid $csm-border-color; 
        } 
      }
      .cm-no-sub {
        text-align: center;
        height: 200px;
        .cm-message-text {
          margin-top: 75px;
        }
      }
      .cm-network-tab{
        font-style: italic;
        color: #A9A9A9;
        height: 300px;        
        .cm-network-btn{
          font-style:normal;
          color: normal;          
        }
      }
       .hover-effect-li:not(:last-of-type){
        border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
      }
      .hover-effect-li:hover{
              background-color: rgba(66, 139, 202, 0.3);
        .noti-text{
         color: #000; 
        }
          }   
    }
    .cm-settings {
      margin-bottom: 10px;
      .panel-body {
        padding: 20px 20px 10px;
      }
      .cm-settings-header {
        padding-bottom: 10px;
        .cm-settings-name {
          display: inline-block;
        }
        .input-switch {
          padding-top: 6px;
          float: right;
          padding-right: 15px;
          width: 60px;          
          label {
            cursor: pointer;
            box-shadow: $cm-switch-box-shadow;
            border-radius: 3px;
          }
        }
      }
      .cm-settings-body {
        padding: 15px 0px 0px;
        //border: 1px solid #ddd;
        .cm-settings-item-head {
          padding: 5px 0px;
          font-weight: bold;
        }
        .cm-settings-item {
          padding: 7px 0px;
          border-bottom: 1px solid $csm-border-color;
          .cm-item-name {
            padding-top: 5px;
          }
          .cm-item-checkbox {
            input {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: auto;
            }
          }
        }
        .cm-settings-item:last-child{
          background-color: #eee;
          border-bottom: 0px; 
        }

      }
      .cm-settings-body {
        border: 1px solid $csm-border-color;
      }
      .cm-settings-parent {
        .cm-settings-name {
          font-weight: 400;
          margin: 0px;
          padding: 17px 20px 17px 0px;
          .fa {
            font-size: 22px;
            color: #ccc;
          }
          .fa {
            font-size: $csm-primary-text-size + 8px;
            color: $csm-icon-color;
          }
        }
      }
      .cm-settings-parent:not(:last-of-type){
        border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
      }
      .cm-settings-parent:not(:last-of-type){
        border-bottom: 1px solid $csm-border-color;
      }
    }
    .cm-noti-actions {
      margin-top: 5px;
      .cm-btn-container.row {
        margin-left: -5px;
        margin-right: -5px;
        .cm-save {
          margin-left: 10px;
        }
        .cm-action-btn {
          margin-top: 10px;
          padding-left: 5px;
          padding-right: 5px;
          .btn {
            width: 100%;
          }
        }
      }
    }
    .cm-list-pagination {
      text-align: center;
      text-align: -webkit-center;
    }

  }

  .cm-align-center {
    text-align: center;
  }
  .cm-align-end {
    text-align: end;
    text-align: -webkit-right;
  }
  .cm-display-none {
    display: none;
  }
  .cm-weight-normal {
    font-weight: normal;
  }
  .cm-alert {
    margin-bottom: 0px;
  }
  .cm-no-border {
    border: none !important;
  }
  .self-clear:after {
    content: "";
    clear: both;
    display: table;
  }

  //
  .input-switch label {
    cursor: pointer;
    box-shadow: $cm-switch-box-shadow;
    border-radius: 3px;

  }
  .input-switch input[type=checkbox]:checked  ~ .switch{
    background-color: $cm-switch-bg;
  }
  .input-switch input[type=checkbox]  ~ .switch {
    height: 28px;
  }
  .cm-widget-body.cm-mobile .input-switch input[type=checkbox]  ~ .switch {
    height: 28px;
  }
  .input-switch input[type=checkbox]:checked  ~ .switch:before {
    left: 20.5px;
  }
}
  
  .noti-title{
    color: #343d47;
    font: 15px "SourceSansPro", "Helvetica Neue", "Helvetica", Arial, sans-serif;
  }
  
  .noti-subtitle{
    color: #81878e;
    font: 13px "SourceSansPro", "Helvetica Neue", "Helvetica", Arial, sans-serif;
    padding: 2px 0; 
  }
  
  h5.noti-subtitle{
    margin-top: -10px; 
  }
  
  .top-30{
   top: 30px; 
  }
  
 .noti-text{
 color: #717171;  
}
  
  .hover-effect-li:not(:last-of-type){
        border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
      }
      .hover-effect-li:hover{
              background-color: rgba(66, 139, 202, 0.3);
       
          }
div.btn.btn-default.icon{
 border: none; 
}

  .back-navigation{
   
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    
  }
  
  .back-navigation h4{
   
    font-size: 1.1em;
    
  }
  
  .cm-settings {
      margin-bottom: 10px;
      .panel-body {
        padding: 20px 20px 10px;
      }
      .cm-settings-header {
        padding-bottom: 10px;
        .cm-settings-name {
          display: inline-block;
        }
        .input-switch {
          padding-top: 6px;
          float: right;
          padding-right: 15px;
          width: 60px;          
          label {
            cursor: pointer;
            box-shadow: $cm-switch-box-shadow;
            border-radius: 3px;
          }
        }
      }

  </css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description>Allows Service Portal users the ability to manage their Notification & Subscription Preferences.</description><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>notification-preferences</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Notification Preferences</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {	
	data.instanceName = gs.getProperty('instance_name');
	data.currentUserId = gs.getUserID();
		
	if(!input){		
	  data.notification_categories = [];	
	}
	
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>david.scroggins</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-11 21:20:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>080ab773dbb223007ce85385ca96191b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Notification Preferences</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_080ab773dbb223007ce85385ca96191b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>david.scroggins</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-12 04:34:47</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div>
  <div class="cm-subs-noti-pref row">
    <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-12 cm-notif-pref-header">
      <header class="cm-widget-header">
        <h3 class="main-header">${Notifications and Subscriptions}</h3>
        <p class="sub-header">${Manage your subscriptions and notification preferences here.}</p>
      </header>
      <div class="cm-recv-notif pull-right">
        <p aria-hidden="true" id="receiveNotifLabel">${Allow Notifications}</p>      
        <div class="input-switch">
          <input aria-labelledby="receiveNotifLabel" id="switch_0{{subObj.sys_id}}" type="checkbox" checked="checked" name="switch_0{{subObj.sys_id}}" data-ng-model="c.enableNotifications">
          <label aria-hidden="true" class="switch" for="switch_0{{subObj.sys_id}}" data-ng-click="c.toggleNotifications($event)">​</label>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-12 cm-right-pane">
      <div class="panel panel-{{::options.panel_type}} widget-toggle csm-widget">
        <div class="panel-heading cm-widget-tabs" role="tabpanel">
          <ul class="nav nav-tabs ">
            <li role="tab" class="hover-effect active cm-noti-tab" data-ng-click="c.showTab('n', $event)">
              <a class="csm-link-disabled" tabindex="0">${Notifications By Category}</a>
            </li>
            <li role="tab" class="hover-effect cm-chan-tab" data-ng-click="c.showTab('c', $event)">
              <a class="csm-link-disabled" tabindex="0">${Notification Channels}</a>
            </li>
          </ul>
        </div>
        <div class="panel-body cm-widget-body hidden-sm hidden-xs">
          <div class="cm-tab-content" data-ng-show="c.showCategories">
            <div class="panel panel-default csm-tile csm-widget cm-subs">
              <div class="panel-body padder-md" data-ng-show="c.subObjects.length">               
                <ul class="list-unstyled cm-subs-list">
                  <li class="row cm-subs-list-item">                    
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-12 cm-sub-name">
  										<div>
  											<h4 class="cm-weight-normal m-t-none pull-right" data-ng-click="c.openFormModal('sys_notif_subscription','-1','New Personal Notification')">
    											<a><span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-plus-square-o"></span> Create Personal Notification</a></h4>
 							 				</div>
									  </div>
                  </li>
                  <li class="row cm-subs-list-item hover-effect-li" data-ng-repeat="subObject in c.subObjects" 
                      data-ng-include="'noti_category_base_template'"></li>
                </ul>
              </div>
              <div class="panel-body padder-md cm-no-sub" data-ng-if="!c.subObjects.length">
                <fa name="spinner" spin="true"></fa>
              </div>              
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="cm-tab-content" data-ng-show="c.showCategoryNotifications">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-12 back-navigation">
  										<div>
  											<h4 class="cm-weight-normal m-t-none pull-left" data-ng-click="c.goBack(c.lastSection)">
    											<a><span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-angle-left"></span> {{c.backText}}</a></h4>
 							 				</div>
									  </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default csm-tile csm-widget cm-settings" data-ng-show="c.showCategoryNotificationsPersonal">
              <div class="panel-body">
                <div class="cm-settings-header">
                  <h4 class="cm-settings-name">${Personal Notifications}</h4>
                 </div>
                <div class="cm-settings-panel">
                  <div class="cm-settings-body" data-ng-include="'noti_notification_subs_template'"></div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default csm-tile csm-widget cm-settings" data-ng-show="!c.showCategoryNotificationDevices">
              <div class="panel-body">
                <div class="cm-settings-header">
                   <h4 class="cm-settings-name">${System Notifications}</h4>
                </div>
                <div class="cm-settings-panel">
                  <div class="cm-settings-body" data-ng-include="'noti_notification_base_template'"></div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default csm-tile csm-widget cm-settings" data-ng-show="c.showCategoryNotificationDevices">
              <div class="panel-body">
                <div class="cm-settings-header">
                  <h4 class="cm-settings-name">{{c.notificationName}}
                  <button class="btn btn-link" ng-click="c.openFormModal('sys_notif_subscription',c.notifSubDevices.records[0].sys_id,'Edit Notification')" aria-haspopup="dialog" role="button" ng-show="c.notifSubDevices.type == 'personal'">Edit</button>
                  </h4>
                </div>
                <div class="cm-settings-panel">
                  <div class="cm-settings-body" data-ng-include="'noti_device_subs_template'"></div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="cm-tab-content" data-ng-show="c.showDevices">
            <div class="panel panel-default csm-tile csm-widget cm-settings">
              <div class="panel-body">
                <div class="cm-settings-header">
                  
  	
  									<h4 class="cm-weight-normal m-t-none pull-right" data-ng-click="c.openFormModal('cmn_notif_device','-1','New Channel')">
    									<a><span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-plus-square-o"></span> Create Channel</a>
  									</h4>
 		
								
                  <h4 class="cm-settings-name">${Notification Channels}</h4>
                  
                </div>
                <div class="cm-settings-panel">
                  <div class="cm-settings-body" data-ng-include="'noti_device_base_template'"></div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="cm-list-pagination" data-ng-if="c.hasMoreRecords && !c.showNotifications"> 
            <button class="btn btn-default" name="Load More" data-ng-click="c.showMore()" role="button" aria-hidden="false">${Show More}</button>
          </div>          
        </div>
        <!-- 88 - 138 -->
        <div class="panel-body cm-widget-body cm-mobile visible-sm visible-xs">
          <div class="cm-settings-parent" data-ng-repeat="subObj in c.subObjects">
            <div data-ng-click="c.toggleSettings($event)">
              <h4 class="cm-settings-name" data-ng-click="c.selectSubObject(subObj, $event)">
                {{subObj.name}}
                <span class="pull-right cm-toggle-icon"><i class="fa fa-plus" aria-hidden="true"></i></span>
                <span class="pull-right cm-toggle-icon cm-display-none"><i class="fa fa-minus" aria-hidden="true"></i></span>
              </h4>
            </div>
            <div class="cm-settings-main cm-display-none">
              <div class="cm-tab-content" data-ng-hide="c.showNotifications">
                <div class="panel panel-default csm-tile csm-widget cm-subs">
                  <div class="panel-body padder-md" data-ng-show="subObj.subscriptions.length">
                    <ul class="list-unstyled cm-subs-list">
                      <li class="row cm-subs-list-item" data-ng-repeat="sub in subObj.subscriptions" 
                          data-ng-include="c.getSubTemplate(sub)"></li>
                    </ul>
                  </div>
                              
                </div>
                <div class="cm-list-pagination" data-ng-if="c.hasMoreRecords && !c.showNotifications"> 
                  <button class="btn btn-default" name="Load More" data-ng-click="c.showMore()" role="button" aria-hidden="false">${Show More}</button>
                </div>                
              </div>
              <div class="cm-tab-content" data-ng-show="c.showNotifications">
                <div class="panel panel-default csm-tile csm-widget cm-settings">
                  <div class="panel-body">
                    <div class="cm-settings-header">
                      <h4 class="cm-settings-name cm-no-border">${ Notification Devices}</h4>
                      <div class="input-switch ng-hide">
                        <input id="switch_1{{devObj.sys_id}}" type="checkbox" checked="checked" name="switch_1{{devObj.sys_id}}" data-ng-model='c.enableNotifications'>
                        <label aria-hidden="true" class="switch" for="switch_1{{devObj.sys_id}}" data-ng-click="c.showSettingsPanel($event)">​</label>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="cm-settings-panel">
                      <div class="cm-settings-body" data-ng-include="'noti_device_base_template'"></div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
         <!-- 88 - 138 -->
      </div>
    </div> 
  </div>
  <style>
    @media (max-width: 420px){
      .cm-subs-noti-pref .cm-right-pane .cm-widget-tabs .nav-tabs > li {
        padding: 0px 12px !important;
        font-size: 17px !important;
      }
    }
    @media (max-width: 350px){
      .cm-subs-noti-pref .cm-right-pane .cm-widget-tabs .nav-tabs > li {
        padding: 0px 6px !important;
        font-size: 14px !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
</div>
]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_container_41b18cc4db8323007ce85385ca9619e4
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_container"><sp_container action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><background_color/><background_image/><background_style>default</background_style><bootstrap_alt>false</bootstrap_alt><class_name/><container_class_name/><name>Notification Preferences - Container 1</name><order>1</order><sp_page display_value="notification_preferences">a2614cc4db8323007ce85385ca9619b6</sp_page><subheader>false</subheader><sys_class_name>sp_container</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>david.scroggins</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-11 21:51:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>41b18cc4db8323007ce85385ca9619e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Notification Preferences - Container 1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_container_41b18cc4db8323007ce85385ca9619e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>david.scroggins</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-11 21:51:58</sys_updated_on><title/><width>container</width></sp_container></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_row_4fb14c04db8323007ce85385ca96194a
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_row"><sp_row action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><class_name/><order>1</order><sp_column/><sp_container display_value="Notification Preferences - Container 1">41b18cc4db8323007ce85385ca9619e4</sp_container><sys_class_name>sp_row</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>david.scroggins</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-11 21:52:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>4fb14c04db8323007ce85385ca96194a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_row_4fb14c04db8323007ce85385ca96194a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>david.scroggins</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-11 21:52:06</sys_updated_on></sp_row></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_ng_template_4f2b3373dbb223007ce85385ca96194a
sys_update_xml.payload: noti_notification_subs_template080ab773dbb223007ce85385ca96191bsp_ng_templatedavid.scroggins2019-01-11 21:23:504f2b3373dbb223007ce85385ca96194a0noti_notification_subs_templateglobalglobalsp_ng_template_4f2b3373dbb223007ce85385ca96194adavid.scroggins2019-01-11 21:23:50
